title: Techno Book Cover 2009
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TechnoBookCover2009_3473.jpg)
  
Same font was on the box for a telescope I purchased about 5 or 10 years ago. Some sort of techno font. I scanned Myfonts for tags techno, futuristc, computer and a few others and found quite a few similars but no match. Same for the dafont techno themes. Any ideas? Thanks.  
Don

Font: 

 Badloc 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124912/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")

author: donshottype

comments.content:
Many thanks Akira. I appreciate your ability to find really obscure fonts.  
I was surprised to learn that the font has existed since the 1990s.  
Don
